name: fibonifty
description: is a minimal, real-time web application that allows agile teams to collaboratively estimate story points. Each team member joins a room, enters their name, submits a point value, and waits for the reveal. Built with WebSockets to ensure everyone stays in sync.

scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && npm run build

author: Chock Mimura
